rooms.description: Open space with flexible seating and colonial aesthetic detailing. Suitable for wheelchair movement, featuring low-profile furniture and wide entryways.
Integrated within the living area or adjacent, providing ample space with a semi-open design, ensuring smooth transitions for wheelchair accessibility.
Functional colonial kitchen with accessible counter heights and easy-to-reach appliances. Includes an island if possible to facilitate movement around the space.
Spacious master bedroom incorporating Vastu principles by placing the bed in a direction that promotes tranquility. Wheelchair accessible with unobstructed pathways and adjustable fixtures.

Comfortable bedroom designed following colonial architecture style with ample space for wheelchair access and natural light. Adheres to Vastu recommendations by positioning the bed in an auspicious direction.
Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with a roll-in shower design and barrier-free access. Colonial fixtures integrated for stylistic continuity.
A quiet library area designed in colonial style featuring adjustable shelves and seating. Accessible with a wheelchair-friendly layout and clear navigation paths.

openings.description: Main entry door aligned with Vastu principles (north or east-facing) to welcome positive energy, ensuring a smooth threshold for wheelchair users.
Secondary exit door facilitating ventilation and additional access. Designed with accessibility in mind.
Colonial-style balcony providing outdoor relaxation space with accessible ramps ensuring wheelchair movement.

accessibility_features.description: All doorways and corridors are designed with minimum width of 36 inches to allow wheelchair maneuverability.
Furniture in all rooms is adjustable or low-profile to ensure ease of access for wheelchair users.

vastu_principles.description: The main entrance is oriented towards the north or east as per Vastu guidelines to invite positive energy.
Rooms are placed in a manner that aligns with Vastu recommendations, e.g., bedrooms and living spaces positioned appropriately for harmonious flow.
